sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  header.menu
    nav.menu__nav
      h1.logo
        a(href='/')
          img.logo__img(src='@/assets/logo.svg' alt='Fuuu hairmake')

      li.menu__nav__link(v-for="item in nav")
        <router-link v-bind:to="item.path">{{ item.page }}</router-link>
    <slideImg></slideImg/>
</template>

<script>
import slideImg from "@/components/slideImg.vue"
import logo from '@/components/logo.vue'

export default {
  name:'fuuuHeader',
  components:{
    slideImg,
    logo
  },
  computed: {
    nav(){return this.$store.getters.nav}
  },
  watch: {
  '$route': function (val) {
    if (val.hash.match(/^#/)) {
      document.getElementById(val.hash.replace(/^#/, '')).scrollIntoView()
    }
  }
}
}
</script>

<style scoped lang="scss">
.menu{
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 100%;
  width: 18vw;
  min-width: 200px;
  padding:6rem 2rem 2rem;
  transition: .3s;
  flex-direction: column;
  @include flx(bet , top);
  flex-direction: column;
  &__nav{
    text-align: left;
    font-size: 15px;
    // position: absolute;
    // bottom: 2rem;
    // left:2rem;
    //background: #fff;
    //    box-shadow: $shadow__02;
    //    border-right: solid thin $rgb__main;

    position: fixed;
    height: 100vh;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 110px;
    background: $rgb__main;
    padding-top: 1rem;


    z-index: 999;
    z-index: 999;
  }
  &__nav__link{
    width: 100px;
    text-align: center;
    line-height: 3rem;
    // background: #fff;
    transition: .3s;
  }
  &__nav__link:hover{
    background: $rgb__accent;
  }
  &__nav__link a{
    // color: $rgb__main;

    color: #fff;

    display: block;
    padding:0.25rem;
  }
  &__nav__link:hover a{
    color: #fff;
  }
  &__nav__link  + .menu__nav__link{
    margin-top: 1rem;
  }
}
.logo{
  // width: 100%;
  text-align:center;

    width: 160px;
    height: 160px;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 1.75rem 1.75rem 1.75rem 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 4rem;
    background: #6a5f4d;
    border-radius: 50%;
    @include flx(cen,cen);

  &__img{
    max-width: 300px;
    width: 100%;
  }
}
.index .menu{
  //width: 35vw;
  width: calc(50vw  - 110px);
  min-width: 300px;
}

</style>
